content: ## Enable LDAP 1. Log in to n8n as the instance owner. 2. Select **Settings** ![Settings icon](/_images/common-icons/settings.png){.off-glb} > **LDAP**. 3. Toggle on **Enable LDAP Login**. 4. Complete the fields with details from your LDAP server. 5. Select **Test connection** to check your connection setup, or **Save connection** to create the connection. After enabling LDAP, anyone on your LDAP server can sign in to the n8n instance, unless you exclude them using the **User Filter** setting. You can still create non-LDAP users (email users) on the **Settings** > **Users** page.
